T07

Class Searcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • T07.Searcher

  • public class Searcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Searcher class that will start after localization. Travels to the relative center of the field and the commencers search. Uses a memory based algorithm that always travels towards sources of light
    Author:
    Ashley Simpson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Searcher(Odometer odometer, Navigation navigation, USPoller middlePoller, MidLightSensorController midLightSensor, Hider hider)
      Constructor in the searcher class that sets up the required objects in the find beacon method

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dropBeacon()
      Method that drops the beacon immediately.
      void findBeacon()
      Method that deals with finding the beacon, has a memory based algorithm that will search the field tile by tile and will always move towards the brightest sources of light.
      void positionAndGrabBeacon()
      Method that positions and grabs the beacon.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Searcher

        public Searcher(Odometer odometer,
        Navigation navigation,
        USPoller middlePoller,
        MidLightSensorController midLightSensor,
        Hider hider)
        Constructor in the searcher class that sets up the required objects in the find beacon method
        Parameters:
        odometer - Odometer object that is used to pass a TwoWheeledRobot object
        navigation - Navigation object that is used to move and orientate the robot
        middlePoller - USPoller object that is used to get the distance to objects
        midLightSensor - MidLightSensorController object that retrieves light values for light searching
        hider - Hider object used to mass the public methods for grabbing and dropping the beacon

    • Method Detail

      • findBeacon

        public void findBeacon()
        Method that deals with finding the beacon, has a memory based algorithm that will search the field tile by tile and will always move towards the brightest sources of light. Initially moves to the center of the field to save on searching time, also the tiles directly against the wall will not be entered because robot too large.

      • positionAndGrabBeacon

        public void positionAndGrabBeacon()
        Method that positions and grabs the beacon.

      • dropBeacon

        public void dropBeacon()
        Method that drops the beacon immediately.
